oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector

Interface RecordInfoProvider<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of the record's key
    V - The type of the record's value
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocalizableRecordInfoProvider<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeoJsonRecordInfoProvider, ShapeFileRecordInfoProvider, SpatialIndexRecordInfoProvider

    public interface RecordInfoProvider<K,V>
    An implementation of this interface is used to extract certain information needed by the API from any record represented as a Key,Value pair, typically, obtained from an InputFormat. The implementer should know how to interpret the given key and value to provide the requested information.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getExtraFields(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extraFields)
      If the current record contains other fields different to id and geometry that are desired to be stored for fast access, they should be returned here by adding them to the passed map.
      JGeometry getGeometry()
      Gets the geometry of the current record
      java.lang.String getId()
      Gets the id of the current record
      void setCurrentRecord(K key, V value)
      Sets the record's key and value.

    • Method Detail

      • getExtraFields

        boolean getExtraFields(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extraFields)
        If the current record contains other fields different to id and geometry that are desired to be stored for fast access, they should be returned here by adding them to the passed map. An example of an extra field is a field containing text that can be used to find the record's location using the MVSSuggest service.
        Parameters:
        extraFields - An empty map where the extra fields can be added
        Returns:
        true if extra fields were added. false otherwise.

      • getGeometry

        JGeometry getGeometry()
        Gets the geometry of the current record
        Returns:
        the current record's geometry or null if the record does not have spatial information

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the id of the current record
        Returns:
        the current record's id

      • setCurrentRecord

        void setCurrentRecord(K key,
                      V value)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the record's key and value. The key and value come from the internal InputFormat's RecordReader specified by the user. The record set here should be used to provide the information requested later by calling the getXX() methods. For example: if the InputFormat is TextInputFormat the key will be a LongWrittable and the value will be a Text.
        Parameters:
        key - A record's key
        value - A record's value
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
